oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Phil Martin and Phil Orr Oral History Interview, 2011 August 26
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Phil Martin and Phil Orr conducted on August 26, 2011 by Luke Herbst as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Interviewees discuss the establishment of the United Way Restore the Dream Centers and the 211 Call Center.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
